Specification: Surrounded by tranquil gardens and soaked in sunshine, this single level home offers a comfortable lifestyle for families with the perfect balance of indoor and outdoor space, while its 729sqm approx. allotment may entice a future extension, rebuild or redevelopment (STCA). ,Proudly placed in the Brentwood Secondary Zone (STSA), the home's wide frontage is overlooked by a wide entry porch where you're invited inside and enticed through to the lounge room displaying polished hardwood floorboards. ,Neatly presented with a LaGermania oven/gas stove and Fisher & Paykel dishwasher, the kitchen is accompanied by a dining zone where you'll find sliding doors opening into the sunroom, the perfect setting for relaxing with friends. ,During those warmer summer days, a covered alfresco deck encourages outdoor entertaining and enjoys the benefits of a bench seat with storage, while the backyard is complemented by a gazebo. ,Clustered together in the hallway, the three bedrooms are comforted by carpet and serviced by a family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Other features include split system heating/air conditioning, high ceilings, storage shed plus a carport with gated access through to the backyard. ,Tucked in a quiet pocket, close to Glen Waverley South Primary, Brentwood Secondary, Caulfield Grammar, The Glen, Jells Park, bus stops, Glen Waverley Station and freeway access points. ,

Blessed with beautiful dimensions and brilliant family spaces, this elegant home is ready to offer a lifetime of enjoyment with its multiple living zones and tranquil placement abutting Scotchmans Creek Trail in the GWSC Zone (STSA)., ,Occupying an impressive 824sqm approx. allotment, the home’s neat presentation is ready for you to simply move in and enjoy with the light-filled lounge room offering a wonderful introduction before flowing through to the dining zone with outdoor access., ,The kitchen is perfectly equipped with Miele double ovens, Bosch stove and Miele dishwasher while the adjacent meals zone opens onto an entertainer’s patio and the rumpus room encourages entertaining with friends., ,Fit for the growing family, the home includes four bedrooms plus a study with the master bedroom boasting a walk-in-robe and ensuite, accompanied by a family bathroom and separate toilet., ,Additionally enjoying the benefits of a tranquil backyard, full-sized laundry, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, excellent storage plus a double garage with internal access and backyard vehicle access., ,This idyllic haven sits close to Syndal South Primary, Glen Waverley Secondary, Huntingtower School, Wesley College, Holmesglen Institute, Monash Aquatic Centre, Syndal Station, The Glen, restaurants and freeways.

Set in a spacious prestige private court just behind the Monash Aquatic Centre and Glen Waverley Tennis Club is this lovely home nestled in tranquil gardens. On entering you are greeted by the separate lounge on your left, with a dining room or convert to study 5th bedroom to your right, leading through to the open plan kitchen meals family area with its big windows taking in the gorgeous tranquil gardens and sun light. There has been new bathrooms and kitchen installed with caesarstone benchtops, induction hotplates and double oven, giving that modern feel. Upstairs there is an open family games area, full bathroom, a massive master bedroom with sitting area for quiet contemplation or reading your favourite book, along with three more good size bedrooms. A lovely location for walks or bike rides along Scotchmans Creek Trail and Callaghan Reserve, or for the sports enthusiast the Central Reserve Sporting Grounds, tennis clubs and aquatic centre.

Overflowing with luxury and lavished with premium style and space, this Carter Grange masterpiece sits in a class of its own and captures breathtaking mountain views in the Glen Waverley Secondary & Glen Waverley Primary zones and nestled on a large 718 m2 allotment. ,Indulging at every turn, the home's grandeur begins with a landscaped front garden and double entry bespoke steel doors that open to reveal a sumptuous foyer detailed with parquetry flooring.,Resting beneath three meter high ceilings, the kitchen, dining and family room flaunts first-class finishes and showcases a gas log fire, marble benches/splashbacks and Ilve appliances (2 x gas stoves, double ovens and dishwasher) all centered around an island breakfast bench.,The butler's pantry has been fitted as a fully functioning 2nd kitchen complete with a Fotile rangehood, while the open plan domain spills out onto an alfresco zone with outdoor meal preparation space overlooking the landscaped backyard boasting mature plants.,Adding to the indulgence, the home features a theatre room with projector and screen plus an upstairs living room that's accompanied by a balcony where you can relish those views.,Flaunting luxury, the six bedrooms all feature walk-in-robes and ensuites, with the master bedroom boasting a study/retreat, fitted walk-in-robe, balcony and designer ensuite boasting twin vanities, a freestanding tub, rainfall shower and floor-to-ceiling tiles.,Quality additions include a luxe powder room, laundry, zoned ducted heating/air conditioning, double glazing, high ceilings, video intercom, CCTV, alarm plus an oversized double garage with internal access and remote-control gated driveway.,Capped off by its prized placement, walking distance to Glen Waverley Primary, Glen Waverley Secondary, Wesley College, The Glen shopping centre, Glen Waverley station and the Kingsway restaurant hub.

Address: 4 Railway Parade North, Glen Waverley, Vic 3150
Specification: RESIDENTIAL GROWTH ZONE - SCHEDULE 4 - 848sq metres approx.,In the heart of Glen Waverley this residence is set on a generous allotment of 848 sqm approx. in Glen Waverley's most exclusive address.  This magnificent opportunity offers immense potential for higher density or other visionary development (STCA). This unrivalled site offers 848 sqm (approx.) of reasonable flat land, and is ideal for those wanting to develop multiple dwellings or build your dream home or is suitable for current investors alike.,Accommodation comprises of 3 bedrooms, serviced by a family bathroom, functional kitchen and a huge backyard.,Centrally located in Glen Waverley, this residence is moments walk to Glen Waverley Train Station, Glen Waverley Secondary College, Wesley College, Century City Walk, Kingsway dining precinct and The Glen Shopping Centre. Close proximity to parklands and reserves, numerous bus routes, Jells Park, the M3 freeway and Holmesglen Tafe.  Located within the Glen Waverley School Catchment Area and Glen Waverley Primary School Zone (STSA).

Address: 755-757 High Street Road, Glen Waverley, Vic 3150
Specification: Combining for an amazing 1451 sqm (approx.) total over two incredible blocks, and placed in a fantastic location that also happens to be in one of Melbourne's most exclusive school zones, this sensational opportunity is one that very rarely comes on the market!,This amazing double block is sure to excite those with redevelopment aspirations. The immense land size lends itself to being transformed into multiple townhouses or units (STCA), while you can't rule out building your grand and custom dream family home on the huge allotment (also STCA). This prospect also delivers great investment potential, where you can rent out the two single level dwellings that exist on the land as you get your plans and permits in place!,Zoned for both the Glen Waverley Secondary College and Glen Waverley Primary School (STSA) as well as being so close to Wesley College, you're also located near the popular The Glen Waverley Shopping Centre, Kingsway restaurants and shops, Glen Waverley North Reserve, Larpent Reserve, buses, Glen Waverley Station, and freeways.
